{"id":692189424,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1651567893,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/692189424/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"52.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n         int ans=0;\n        int sum=0;\n        int leftsum=0;\n        int rightsum=0;\n\n         for(int i:nums){\n             sum+=i;\n         }\n         rightsum=sum-nums[0];\n         for(int i=1;i<nums.length;i++){\n             if(leftsum==rightsum){\n                 ans=i-1;\n\n                 break;\n             }\n\n             leftsum+=nums[i-1];\n             rightsum-=nums[i];\n         }\n         if(leftsum!=rightsum){\n             if(ans==0){\n                 ans=-1;\n             }\n         }\n        else{\n             if(ans==0&&(sum-nums[0]!=rightsum)){\n                 ans=nums.length-1;\n             }\n         }\n\n\n         return ans;\n       \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
